rmp.university: University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill
comments: The online homework is super long. She genuinely has your interests in mind and open to help in any way possible. Very sweet and reasonable lady. 3

She is very nice and genuinely wants you to learn spanish. She will extend any assignment deadline to make sure you do it right. The homework is online and it is fairly long, but not too difficult. As long as you go to class and small group sessions you'll be fine.

Beatriz is very nice and keeps the classroom mood informal and relaxed. She's from Spain so you get practice hearing the vosotros forms.  SPAN 300 is probably the hardest class in the department, but Beatriz really goes out of her way to make sure you understand the material, are prepared for exams, etc.  Super sweet (and also gorgeous!) lady.
